repl_description:
Modern website for strategIA AI solutions company featuring a responsive design and integrated AI communication capabilities. The site includes core sections including navigation, hero, services, about, blog with AI insights, contact form, and footer components, with full Spanish language support.

Key features and technologies:
• Responsive design architecture
• Dark mode implementation
• ElevenLabs Convai widget integration
• Interactive contact form system
• Multi-language support (English/Spanish)
• Blog system with database integration
• Dynamic date formatting
